summary:
Craftable, improvable Amethyst armor based on appearance of Stahlrim armor.
Uses amethyst gems
Glass Smithing perk required
Dragonborn DLC required
descriptionHtml:
[center][heading] Amethyst Armor [/heading][/center]

[center][b]Dedication:[/b][/center]
This mod is dedicated to my brother, Andrew, who never believed I could do anything with mods, but is a great brother anyway.

[line]
[center][b]Purpose:[/b][/center]
This mod grew out of my experiments with GIMP and a desire to make gems useful for more than jewelry. I love Stahlrim armor, but wondered what it'd be like if it came in purple. And now it does.

[line]
[center][b]Description:[/b][/center]
This mod adds two sets of retextured Stahlrim armor to the game: a Light Amethyst armor and a Reinforced Amethysy armor (heavy version). It also adds a heavy armor Amethyst Shield. Both sets are craftable at the forge under the Glass section and require the Glass Smithing perk. All vanilla races are supported but beast races may experience clipping with the heavy armor helmet. The Heavy armor is slightly better than Ebony armor, and the Light armor is slightly better than Glass armor.

[line]
[center][b]Requirements:[/b][/center]
Latest version of Skyrim
Dragonborn DLC

[line]
[center][b]Installation/Uninstallation:[/b][/center]
I recommend a manual download and install with NMM.
Or you can extract the .esp and .bsa into your Skyrim Data folder.
To uninstall, just delete DGWAmethystArmor.esp and DGWAmethystArmor.bsa

[line]
[center][b]Credits:[/b][/center]
Stahlrim armor by Bethesda.
Armor textures from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42360/?] Bethesda Performance Textures - Armor - Clothes - Weapons [/url] by Gamwich.
UNPB body for screenshots from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?] UNP Blessed Body [/url] by Blessed Redux Project team.
